title: Mr
body: I really love this game, but there is one thing that i find much joy in all other games and it seems to be missing here.  Achievements!!, I love achievement hunting!!.  So does anyone know if this might be on the cards for League Of Legends?

replies.body:
I'm a big fan of adding achievements to the game as well, it adds more rewards aside from just winning. Unfortunately I don't have any answers for you today, but maybe I can add a bit of context to the issue.

_Here's what we know about achievements right now:_

 + **Riot** used to be very keen about adding achievements to the game. In the past we even had an [achievements tab](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=854543) in the client, but this was removed in patch 3.7

 Since then achievement icons have become an occasional thing included in special events, but apart from that achievements really haven't moved forward for a while.

I wonder if Riot wasn't able to implement achievements due to limitations with the client at the time? It's possible that the new reworked client will open up the possibility for achievements again.

If anyone has any additional info on this, I'd love to hear it ;)

There are achievements though.

Unlocking mastery points, rising through ranked and getting champion masteries.

Sure they're not achievements like Steam or XBox, but they are achievements.
